attributes.action: stop leyton orient from moving into the  olympic stadium in stratford
attributes.additional_details:
I don't think Leyton Orient should be allowed to move into the Olympic Stadium because they would be moving into the borough of Newham which is the borough West Ham United reside in. Therefore they would be moving  onto the doorstep of that football club which is  part of the reason Barry Hearne has said should stop West Ham from moving there.
If they are allowed to move there would they not have to change their name as they would no longer be in Leyton or indeed Waltham Forest. What would they call themselves then?
